group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3024A03]Bye-bye, trouble!
Phew...we beat it!
For goodness sake... Just when I thought the@seeds were done with, a Witch comes along...

group_1.textLeft: Maybe we should consider it fortunate that it@came after we finished...?

group_1.textRight: This was better than having it show up in the@middle of that, right?

group_1.textLeft: The seeds...are all taken care of...@...thank goodness...

group_1.textRight: ...Hey.
Is it really your magic that was causing@all the trouble?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yup.

group_1.textRight: Hmm...your reactions have been kinda dodgy...
You're hiding something about the "seeds of@trouble", aren't you?
We'd like to hear everything...

group_1.textLeft: The culprit has been caught, and the@school festival will be safe...
So, it's fine...

group_1.textRight: I don't understand...
You didn't want to destroy it, so why...?
Earlier, you said, "my magic is the power to@create opportunities"...
The trouble caused by the seeds weren't@really opportunities at all.
Where did those seeds really come from?

group_1.textLeft: ...That's...

group_1.narration: "When my Soul Gem became cloudy...@A monster came out and created the seeds...@It should have been born from my magic power,@but I couldn't control it at all..."

group_1.textLeft: Soul Gem...monster...?

group_1.textRight: Perhaps she's referring to a Doppel?

group_1.textLeft: Doppels... Can they not be controlled?

group_1.textRight: ...That depends on the individual.
Some of the Black Feathers couldn't handle@them very well...

group_1.textCenter: If I don't have any desire to stop the@school festival...
Do you still think I would unconsciously@cause trouble?

group_1.textRight: An unconscious crime...!
Your Doppel caused the trouble because you@had the motive.

group_1.textLeft: ...In the end, it's my fault...@...so...I really am the culprit...

group_1.textRight: That's why you tried to make things right?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.

group_1.narration: "I really wanted to deal with the seeds myself,@but they wouldn't disappear no matter what I did...@So I sent out a threatening letter to warn people..."
"After that, I found a Magical Girl using my magic,@but I couldn't muster up the courage to ask for help..."

"I decided to come to the school at night to at least@collect the seeds, and then I found all of you...@I figured you came here to catch the culprit...@So I was hoping that you would apprehend me,@solve the problem, and protect the school festival..."

group_1.textLeft: I didn't...want it to be ruined...@...because of me...
And...I have to take responsibility@for what I've done...

group_1.textRight: So that's it...
...If that's how it is, we can't just turn you in@and say you're the culprit.

group_1.textLeft: That's why...I didn't want to mention it...
If they never find out who did this...@Everyone's going to be troubled...

group_1.textRight: All right! You gotta take responsibility!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...that's been my plan all along...

group_1.narration: "You will be working with me as a committee member@during the preparations for the school festival tomorrow!
"And on the day of the festival...@We'll be eating delicious food together@while patrolling the festival!

group_1.textLeft: ...Um, as a culprit, I'm supposed to be@handed over to the school and police...

group_1.textRight: Well then, to make it so that the threatening@letter was just a harmless trick...
You're gonna have to protect the school festival@to turn it into a lie!
Her real desire slipped in there for a moment,@but I agree with her.
Me too...

group_1.textLeft: B-but...

group_1.textRight: Our senpais look like they're okay with it,@and I won't accept any objections!

group_1.textLeft: ...Okay.
*Giggle*...@I'll take responsibility.

group_1.textRight: I'm Tsumugi Wakana, a second-year in@middle school who loves to eat!
Nice to meet you, Senpai!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...it's nice to meet you...
This sauce is delicious too!

group_1.textRight: Oh, really...

group_1.textLeft: Hey! Are you eating on the job?!

group_1.textRight: I made sure to get permission...!

group_1.textLeft: You can take that to go, so please get back@to work.

group_1.textRight: Yaaay! Manaka, you're so sweet!
Well, let's go!
Umm, pardon us...

group_1.textCenter: But, it looks like they're doing well.

group_1.textLeft: We've finished my rounds! Tomorrow is@the big day of the school festival!

group_1.textRight: ...*Giggle*.

group_1.textLeft: Are you looking forward to it?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...very much!

group_1.textLeft: It's the school festival!

group_1.narration: And everything is in full swing!
There was no major trouble,@and Senpai and I spent our free time@visiting other Magical Girls@and eating lots of food!

group_1.textLeft: We'll take a break when we're done@patrolling the old school building.
Is there anywhere you want to go?

group_1.textRight: Let's see...@...Well, there's one place...

group_1.textLeft: The arch...?

group_1.textRight: ...I'd like to see it properly...

group_1.textLeft: Ah! I've got a good idea!

group_1.textRight: Good idea...?

group_1.textLeft: Manaka! Did you come to see the arch too?

group_1.textRight: No, I just noticed the two of you.
By the way, are you going to stay transformed@the whole time...?

group_1.textLeft: I'm kind of embarrassed to show you my@uniform at this point...

group_1.textRight: Really...? Is this something like a@"maiden's delicate heart"?

group_1.textLeft: So, do you wanna take a photo like that?

group_1.textRight: Photo...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, since we're all here, let's take a photo@of the three of us together!
Won't it make a good memory?
You don't want to?

group_1.textRight: No...
I just thought maybe I shouldn't be so embarrassed...
Please wait a moment.

group_1.textLeft: Senpai! You look great in your uniform!

group_1.textRight: Okay, let's get to it!

group_1.textLeft: Hurry up, Senpai!
